/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of buildings and trees, their green foliage contrasting with the concrete structures. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
